title: People hold cash, money multiplier reduced

content.question: The money-creating ability of the banking system will be less than the maximum amount indicated by the money multiplier when

choices.label: the velocity of money is rising
people hold a portion of their money in the form of currency
the government's budget is in deficit

content.answer: people hold a portion of their money in the form of currency

topic.text: 4.4: Banking and the Expansion of the Money Supply

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
